Layout/FirstParameterIndentation.description:
Description

Checks the indentation of the first parameter in a method definition.
Layout/FirstParameterIndentation.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: consistent (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['consistent', 'align_parentheses'] (type: list)
IndentationWidth: None (type: NoneType)
